page.title: 13Pets in Maltby
page.content: Pets are kept by 65% of the families in Maltby. In a survey of 360 homes, 38% of the homes had dogs;whilst 16% had freshwater fish and 15% had cats. Nine other species of pet were also kept. Pets have different diets. Tin food was the most popular with 25% meal and scraps each with 12%,followed by dehydrated and fresh meat each with 11%. 60% of the people spent more than an hour a day on their pets. 14% spent between 30 minutes and 1 hour a day. People kept pets for various reasons; 25% regarded themselves as animal lovers,24% wanted the pets for company.14% had pets and animals as hobby interests. Yet 12% needed dogs to guard their homes. Three-quarters of the people spent between Â£2.00 and Â£5.00 a week on pet food.
